author: wn.com
title: Theresa May Tory conference speech: Home Secretary sparks outrage with pledge to crackdown on immigration
text: Theresa May provoked a storm of protest after she claimed mass migration was harming social cohesion in Britain and announced plans to toughen rules on entitlement to asylum. Business leaders, universities, NHS chiefs and refugee groups
